text: Michael Jerome Irvin (born March 5, 1966) is a former American football player for the Dallas Cowboys. He is also a former broadcaster for ESPN's NFL Countdown. He is commonly known as one of the most successful wide receivers in the history of the National Football League. ==Other websites== *Michael Irvin's Official Website and Merchandise . Category:American football wide receivers Category:Dallas Cowboys players Category:Sportspeople from Fort Lauderdale, Florida Category:1966 births Category:Living people
title: Michael Irvin
